channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Multiple potholes on both lanes as you go up, 23rd February
item.description:
Multiple dangerous potholes as you go up from Cheltenham to Oxford on A40 about 100 yards after the junction with A40 X A436. Please repare this properly with professionq team and provinding waranty...as we do mot need on our roads amatorial repairs which are lasting just a couple of months. Thank you, Daniel
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain in the road is blocked at B4070/Ridgeway Close, 22nd February
item.description:
The public highway drain on B4070 is completely blocked. We tried to clear it but it looks like the problem is further down the pipe under the B4070 towards Emin way. Flood water is accumulating
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridgeway Close, Birdlip, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light at corner of Billings Way and Merestones Drive is not working, 22nd February
item.description:
Opposite number 1 Billings Way
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Merestones Drive, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Uneven road surface, 22nd February
item.description:
Cirencester Road, Croft Road junction. Large patch of uneven road, previously reported and apparently repaired this morning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 112, Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole galore, 22nd February
item.description:
I can't believe that you fixed the road by the new builds towards Pilgrove Bridge then left the incline in it's depressing state. Driving to Cheltenham is a nightmare on this road, you need to take evasive action. All that has been done in the past is patch-jobs which have of course fallen away. It's absolutely ridiculous that this hasn't been fixed yet.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large man hole covered by unsecured piece of wood, 22nd February
item.description:
Very dangerous situation outside of a school. The work carried out removed the metal cover and replaced it with a loose wooden one. If anyone falls into this, it’s a 5 foot drop into a large hole. There are “railings” which are meant to block access, but these get knocked, blown over and cast aside. This is literally insane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melville Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive, 22nd February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Huge puddle not draining, 22nd February
item.description:
Dangerously large puddle forms after heavy rain here all the time, it’s so large it causes drivers to swerve and also deep. Curb in poor state of repair. Unsure if there is a drain in this spot but this is a common occurrence.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Wellington Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 22nd February
item.description:
Customer states that this closure is not consistent, it is either open or has traffic lights on it. Customer owns a business and his customers are unable to get the their business premises. Customer states the traffic lights should be,
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose and rocking dropped kerbs, 22nd February
item.description:
Kerbs outside of 23 Blenheim Orchard are loose and protruding. Trip hazard or could cause damage to vehicles. It’s been like this for a few years but progressively getting worse as more mud and debris gets under the kerbs

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Blenheim Orchard, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
